term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - radiant energy, Q
term.title: radiant energy

item.text: The total energy emitted, transferred or received as radiation in a defined period of time (Q = ∫ Q λ ⁢ d λ). It is the product of radiant power, P, and time, t: Q = P t when the radiant power is constant over the time considered.
